thread.title: Restrictions on water rates get newfound opposition from Gov. Jerry Brown
thread.title_full: Restrictions on water rates get newfound opposition from Gov. Jerry Brown - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Restrictions on water rates get newfound opposition from Gov. Jerry Brown
text: Gov. Jerry Brown Allen J. Schaben / Los Angeles Times Gov. Jerry Brown, pictured here last year with glasses of reclaimed water in Orange County , wants to change a 1996 ballot initiative that has limited his efforts to tackle the drought.
